comment.text: This translation key is used to display a button that prompts users to download an app. In this specific context, it appears as a part of a deep-linking functionality in a document editor application, and its purpose is to invite users to open the app from within the app itself or stay within the browser.

usage.context:
onClick={
 isOpenInAppOnly ? onDownloadAppClick : onStayBrowserClick
 }
 >
 {isOpenInAppOnly
 ? t("DeepLink:DownloadApp")
 : t("DeepLink:StayInBrowser")}
 </Link>
 </StyledActionsWrapper>
 </StyledDeepLink>
 </FormWrapper>
